item.title: TinyCore Linux - Initial steps
item.description: For this system, which will eventually be a server called verynice, I made a VM with 256MB of RAM and 640MB of disk. [TinyCore]1 is a very special Linux installation, destined for systems with very few resources. I’ll use the Deluxe version, CorePlus, with leather seats, GUI and possibility of disk installation, but there are leaner flavors of CoreLinux that will cheerfully boot from a 128MB flashdrive and load themselves to a RAMdrive at startup.
